sentences.en: After that the two alliances might be subsumed into a new European security system.
sentences.cn: 之后两个联盟可能会被归入新的欧洲保安系统中。

sentences.en: Much as relativity subsumed Newtonian physics, a quantum theory of gravity will ultimately subsume relativity.
sentences.cn: 就如同相对论将牛顿物理学给纳入一般, 终究也可能会有个量子理论,将相对论给收编进来.

sentences.en: With unification, East Germany was subsumed by capitalist West Germany.
sentences.cn: 统一后，东德被归入资本主义的西德。

trans.tran_en: If something is subsumed within a larger group or class, it is included within it, rather than being considered as something separate
